body: following Chris' tutorial 17: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OWeoXlQyPxg&index=18&list=P...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OWeoXlQyPxg&index=18&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_) two window constructions are created: doublePane and singlePane, and they are assigned to different zones using the **Set EP Zone Construction** component. However, when using **Label Zone Surface** with **EnergyPlus Construction** option of the **surface attribute lists** component, the window construction is still the default exterior window. May I ask where I did wrongly? Thanks! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/-HoKvkav3swRQWepxr-74gE7jyP8GxDre42t*VGiIyj39pd*Q4xF*fxEQus31KyAV*mcFRD2YuV8MBT5X1-JnZjvNU*TBtTm/01.PNG)
topic: [help] customised window construction is not applied to zones
